comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
From the Commonwealth War Graves Commission website:

Name:WILLIS, SAMUEL
Initials:S
Nationality:United Kingdom
Rank:Captain
Regiment/Service:Royal Irish Rifles
Unit Text:14th Bn.
Age:43
Date of Death:01/07/1916
Additional information:Son of the late Jacob and Mrs. Willis; husband of Mary Christina Willis, of Lynncrest, Coleraine Rd., Portrush, Co. Antrim.
Casualty Type:Commonwealth War Dead
Grave/Memorial Reference:Pier and Face 15 A and 15 B.
Memorial:THIEPVAL MEMORIAL

comment.author: 69717788@N04
comment._content: Son of Jacob Willis. No known grave Commemorated on Thiepval Memorial www.lennonwylie.co.uk/RobertThompsonColeraine1.htm Commemorated in Coleraine Academical Institution, Castlerock Road Commemorated on plaque in Bann Rowing Club Boathouse Commemorated in St. Patrick's Parish Church, Coleraine
